name: Rym 9000
summary: Rym 9000 is a hyperkinetic shooter inspired by Akira, Neon Genesis Evangelion, and Guxt. A treasure-hunting journey to the Moon developed by Sonoshee and composed by Roex. A unique high-octane experience conceived to stimulate your senses and make your eyes and ears bleed!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: macOS
  • 平台: SteamOS + Linux
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年1月16日
  • 售价: ¥ 26
  • 官方网站: https://sonoshee.itch.io/rym9k
